paragraph.paragraph: The EiffelEnvision Eiffel Editor exposes a number of configurable properties, configurable through the use of the Visual Studio .NET ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxoriOptions.htmOptions Dialog Box. You can access the options pages using Tools, Options menu.

The Eiffel editor has a total of three configuration pages to configure various aspects of the editor and the way it behaves. Please see each section for more information on configuration.
